translations.name: Product Comparison Researcher
translations.description: Compares multiple products or options before decision-making. Uses Web Research Agent and Tabular Formatter to create comprehensive comparison charts with pros/cons analysis.
translations.instructions:
1. List products to compare
2. Define comparison criteria
3. Set budget constraints (optional)
4. Choose product category
5. Add specific requirements (optional)
6. Select decision factors
7. Set comparison depth

The researcher will:
- Gather data from multiple sources
- Create detailed comparison tables
- Analyze pros and cons
- Calculate value propositions
- Provide recommendations
- Include user reviews summary
- Show price history trends
- Identify best use cases
- Highlight deal breakers
- Suggest alternatives

Compares:
- Features and specifications
- Pricing and value
- User ratings and reviews
- Availability and shipping
- Warranty and support
- Compatibility
- Long-term costs
- Environmental impact
